structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases

law.catch_line: Stone Walls Or Fences; Unauthorized Removal
law.text: Whoever wilfully and without right pulls down or removes any portion of a stone wall or fence which is erected or maintained for the purpose of enclosing land shall be punished by a fine of not more than ten dollars. Natural resource officers and deputy natural resource officers of the office of the secretary of the executive office of environmental affairs, may arrest without a warrant any person found violating this section.
